section:
Platform STM32 Platform STM32 Collaboration diagram for Platform STM32:
Classes
class DIOSTM32FACTORY
Data Input/Output STM32 class.
class DIOSTM32GPIO
Data Input/Output STM32 General Port Input/Ouput (GPIO)
class DIOSTM32LEDNEOPIXELWS2812B
Data Input/Output STM32 Led Neopixel WS2812B.
class DIOLEDNEOPIXELWS2812B
Data Input/Output Led Neopixel WS2812B class.
class DIOSTM32STREAMI2C
Data Input/Output STM32 Stream I2C class.
class DIOSTM32STREAMSPI
Data Input/Output STM32 Stream SPI class.
class DIOSTM32STREAMUART
Data Input/Output STM32 Stream UART class.
class DIOSTM32STREAMUSB
Data Input/Output STM32 Stream USB class.
class MAINPROCSTM32
Main Proc STM32 class.
class XSTM32_FATSD_SPI
eXtended STM32 FAT SD cards by SPI class
class XSTM32_HAL
STM32 HAL includes.
class XSTM32DATETIME
eXtended Utils STM32 date time class
class XSTM32DIR
eXtended WINDOWS Directory class
class XSTM32DIR_NOTUNICODE
STM32 eXtended Not Unicode Directory class.
class XSTM32EEPROMMEMORYMANAGER
eXtended utils STM32 Flash Memory class
class XSTM32FACTORY
eXtended utils STM32 platform factory class
class XSTM32FILE
eXtended STM32 File class (Use FatFs - Generic FAT file system module)
class XSTM32FILE_NOTUNICODE
STM32 eXtended Not Unicode File class (Use FatFs - Generic FAT file system module)
class XSTM32RAND
eXtended utils STM32 rand class
class XSTM32SLEEP
eXtended utils STM32 rand class
class XSTM32SYSTEM
eXtended utils STM32 system class
class XSTM32THREAD
eXtended utils STM32 mutex & thread class
class XSTM32TIMER
eXtended utils STM32 timer class
class XSTM32TRACE
eXtended utils STM32 timer class
